response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I think it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I'm extending this opportunity to you for $120. This price reflects the value I see in the product and my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and needs.", "product_price": 120}
